title: Game wont start
body:
Hello! As I try to start the Launcher.exe, the badge pops up and then disappears, I open up the launcher.exe as an administrator and the same thing.
Badge pops up and then disappears and yet nothing happends. I opened up my task manager to see if the proccess was ongoing but couldnt find it there either.

So I kept the task manager open and started the game again, badge showed and yet nothing in my task manager and then the badge disappears again.
I uninstalled the game and reinstalled it and same thing. Badge shows and then it disappears.

Anyone got the same problem who might have an solution?

Thanks in advanced.

replies.body: do you have Avast by any chance?
Indeed I do, also tried disabling it

I also had this problem. Avast deleted one of the RADS file's for some reason.

Go right click avast on the taskbar, go to virus chest, find the LoLLauncher.exe file that avast removed (be careful you don't want to restore an actual virus by accident), right click and hit restore & add to exclusions.

even if you disable avast it's already removed the file (at least to my knowledge it has) so it's still not going to work.

The message I get reads as follows:

The Instruction at 0x000000000FBCA2E referenced memory at 0x000000000137A644.  The memory could not be written.

Click on OK to terminate the program.

I get several different renditions of this.

Okay, I did something and I have literally no clue of what I did. I flipped shit and couldn't care less about it for the time being so I closed all folders as they were and played something else. Windows forced an update and restarted my computer (for like the 8th time) and I kept on playing my other game.
I decided to try launching league cuase I had nothing to lose and it showed up and started patching. Wierdest thing ever.

Thanks for the help everyone anyone :)

Just to confirm-Have you tried all the steps in our [Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) article?  If you could, go ahead and run through all the steps in there.  Let me know if you're still having troubles afterwards!

> [{quoted}](name=RiotBok,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=yUAR9rp2,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-05-19T20:28:02.848+0000)
>
> Just to confirm-Have you tried all the steps in our [Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) article?  If you could, go ahead and run through all the steps in there.  Let me know if you're still having troubles afterwards!

I'm going through them now. Reset winsock did not work, refresh rate did not work. Trying to force a Re-patch now. I'll update later.
*Update, the force re-patch did not work. **Update: Nothing from the patching list has worked. Hopefully once I get a reply from my ticket I'll post in here on how to fix it and on the boards. This may take a while

Doesnt even have anything in my folders that I use to force the re-patching with. I literally just installed the game so all the folders are fresh from default and doesnt contain anything yet. Not even the stuff I use to force a re-patch with or repair.
I am still having problem, tried all of the patching issues listed there

If you've gone through all of those steps, next step would be to submit us a ticket so that we can take a deeper look into what's going on!  When you send in the ticket, be sure to include the following logs to help speed up the process:

* [Network Analysis](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)

* [Network Information Log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4)

* [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)

* [DxDiag](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5)
Same here. Already tried restarting, running as admin and that is about as far as my knowledge goes.
Yeah, I did all of that as well. Nothing helped. Even tried to deleted the RADS/Projects/lol_launcher
Yeah having the same problems here....
